# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a split view controller from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Creating a split view controller

- **init(style:)**: Creates a split view controller with the specified column style.
- **init(nibName:bundle:)**: Creates a split view controller with the nib file in the specified bundle.
